name: TC 13.01.06 - Check the display of the info block text in section 1 'home-main' in the Promo Block
description:
This test checks if the info block text in section 1 'home-main' is correct
            in the Promo Block under header on the main page
descriptionHtml: This test checks if the info block text in section 1 'home-main' is correct in the Promo Block under header on the main page
statusMessage:
selenium.common.exceptions.WebDriverException: Message: unknown error: Chrome failed to start: exited abnormally.
  (unknown error: DevToolsActivePort file doesn't exist)
  (The process started from chrome location /usr/bin/google-chrome is no longer running, so ChromeDriver is assuming that Chrome has crashed.)
